column4: this hissing is constant, even without any media players, how do I change from XV vs GL vs VDPAU?
yes the hissing is through the headphones, I've had a play around with the outputs, but it doesn't change anything.
does it sound like sssssssssssssssssssss.   ya I hate that
yeah its a sssssssssssssssss, like it's a very cheap sound card. But I payed a fair bit for this.
there are some cool filters in ladspa but not sure that will do for you
if your into sound you should play with ladspa and jackd
I just wanted a decent one for my mic to work and nicer music.
you might want to see what other people have said about your sound card chips,  sudo lshw ;  and google the sound chip in linux
other posibility is your mixer settings are just open on mic even when you play music but not likely
it says to update drivers, but I already have the most up-to-date ones
do you think it might be broken, it is a refurbished model.
uptodate does not mean it works,  in linux new does not mean better
to be honest there's not much in good on it that I can find. I think I might return it.
is there anything else you can suggest?
Just tried messing arround in alsamixer
wow without my help, you might of figured it out sooner
